alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:32PM CDT until July 31 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GARDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 632 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Antioch, or 14 miles east of Alliance, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Antioch, Miles Lake, Wickson Lake, Tralnor Lake and Herman Lake. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 108. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
